alert.note: Alert for Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys; Northwestern San Juan Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 22 at 7:30PM MST until December 25 at 11:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THURSDAY TO 11 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected especially above 9000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 16 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Gore and Elk Mountains/Central Mountain Valleys and Northwest San Juan Mountains. * WHEN...From 11 AM Thursday to 11 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys; Northwestern San Juan Mountains
